title: 精英怪怎么改成百分百刷精英怪
author: wzxhwzy
txt_content: 精英怪怎么百分百刷精英怪，求解

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
.minecraf\config\infernalmobs.cfg

中，设置

   # One in THIS many Mobs will become atleast rare
    I:eliteRarity=15

为 1

replies.author: 明日的星
replies.txt_content: 骚啊，精英怪那么抖m，还想改难，不过这应该改不了吧
